articles.title: 4th set of human remains found in Lake Mead - ABC News
articles.description: Human remains were found again at Lake Mead National Recreation Area, the country's largest reservoir, officials announced.
articles.content:
Human remains were again found in Lake Mead, the country's largest reservoir that continues to shrink amid a decades-long drought, officials announced Sunday.

articles.title: Covid lockdown strands 80,000 tourists in 'China's Hawaii' - CNN
articles.description: Around 80,000 tourists are stranded in the popular resort city of Sanya on China's tropical Hainan island after authorities announced lockdown measures to stem an outbreak of Covid-19.
